review: I love this product with how you can connect it to your tv satellite/cable like Dish, Direct TV, COX, and more. The reason why I give it four stars is because some of it can't connect to Time Warner Cable.

review: Easy to Setup. Now i can cast everything on my Ipad to my 65" TV for the whole family. We are loving it.
